titleStmt.title: County Clerks Office in the town of Helena, Ark.

availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

org.orgName: County Clerks Office in the town of Helena, Ark.

body.p: The county of Phillips County, AR, and the Phillips Circuit Court Clerk's office, formed by the Arkansas territorial legislature on 1 May 1820. Phillips county is located in Eastern Arkansas, the Mississippi River serving as the county's eastern boundary.

bibl.p: "Phillips County, Arkansas Genealogy," FamilySearch Wiki, https://familysearch.org/wiki/en/PhillipsCounty,Arkansas_Genealogy (accessed 8 Aug 2017).
